channel.title: Running Source cmd...Run.bat Problems
channel.description: Hey everyone, I have recently gotten a new computer and its windows xp and I am trying to start hosting again and I don't know what to put in the run.cmd for the source for it to allow me to host it. Could you'll please post it in code format below if you know how? and I have the latest version of java. 7_5

item.title: Running Source cmd...Run.bat Problems
item.dc:creator: @DevinCooley DevinCooley
item.description:
@DevinCooley wrote:

find the three digits so like 1.6.0_11. Since you have update 7_5 change those digits to 1.7.0_05

That is if it is jdk so it will look like this at the end. jdk1.7.0_05/bin/etc etc.

If it is jre then change it to jre7.

Hope this helped!

Read full topic
